sense.def:
To rub something
pomeni premikati roko ali kos blaga sem ter tja po nečem in pri tem močno pritiskati.

seg.quote: He groaned and rubbed his eyes.

sense.def:
To rub a part of one's body against a surface
pomeni nasloniti del telesa ob neko površino in ga ob njej premikati sem ter tja.

seg.quote: She rubbed her cheek against my temple.

sense.def:
To rub a substance onto a surface
pomeni z roko razmazati snov po neki površini in jo vtisniti vanjo.

seg.quote: The ointment he rubbed into the wound made it feel better.

sense.def:
Kadar dve stvari
rub together
ali kadar nekdo
rubs two things together
, se dve stvari dotikata in premikata sem ter tja ena ob drugi.

seg.quote: He rubbed his hands and laughed.

sense.def:
To rub something in
pomeni govoriti o nečem, kar zadeva sogovornika ali poslušalca in je zanj neprijetno;

seg.quote: ‘How old are you? Forty?’—‘All right, no need to rub it in.’
They hoped that some of his prowess might rub off on them.

sense.def:
To rub out something
pomeni z radirko, krpo ali gobo odstraniti nekaj, kar je napisano na papirju ali tabli.
